And <WG2532> white <WG3022> robes <WG4749> were given <WG1325> <WG5681> unto every one of them <WG1538>; and <WG2532> it was said <WG4483> <WG5681> unto them <WG846>, that <WG2443> they should rest <WG373> <WG5672> yet <WG2089> for a little <WG3398> season <WG5550>, until <WG2193> their <WG846> fellowservants <WG4889> also <WG2532> and <WG2532> their <WG846> brethren <WG80>, that should <WG3195> <WG5723> be killed <WG615> <WG5745> as <WG5613> <WG2532> they <WG846> were, should <WG3739> be fulfilled <WG4137> <WG5695>.
